| --------- | --------- | -------------------------- | --------- | ------- |

| `dark`    | `dark`    |                            | `boolean` | `false` |
| `round`   | `round`   | define switch style        | `boolean` | `false` |
| `square`  | `square`  | define switch parent style | `boolean` | `false` |
